verses.roman:
rājā kahe-dekhi' mora haila camatkāra
vaiṣṇavera aiche teja dekhi nāhi āra

synonyms: rājā kahe—the King said; dekhi'—after seeing; mora—my; haila—there is; camatkāra—astonishment; vaiṣṇavera—of the devotees of the Lord; aiche—such; teja—effulgence; dekhi—I see; nāhi—not; āra—anyone else.
translation: The King said, "Upon seeing all these devotees, I am very much astonished, for I have never seen such an effulgence.
